ingredients.ingredient: 1 medium eggplant, peeled and sliced into 1/2 inch rounds

cookingTips: Use mayonnaise instead of oil to adhere bread crumbs and add richness
Spread eggplant slices in single layer for even browning
Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until golden and eggplant is tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why use mayonnaise as a coating? How do you prevent eggplant from becoming soggy?
